I think the best ways to learn Data Science is by doing, but few programs / bootcamps offer insight into what the job is like. 

Are there any data folks I know who want to volunteer their time show newbies what a day in the life is like? #BlackTechTwitter #rstats

Did you know you can append data to an existing CSV file without opening that file and importing the data into #Rstats first? Use append = TRUE in either #rdatatable's fread() function or the #tidyverse vroom pkg's vroom_write(). https://t.co/Md3RYUiplh

How to Deliver Max Value Using R & Python
From @LanderAnalytics,
For #DataScience teams to be successful, they need to embrace both #RStats & Python. The ease of interoperability gives the user the flexibility to fill in any tool gaps for their own needs.
